name: StaffMatcher
tag_list: business, recruitment, human-resources, b2b, business-to-business, enterprise, software
overview:
StaffMatcherâ„¢ is an easy to use, online psychometric test and recruitment system designed to evaluate your job applicants as effectively as any recruitment agency. A comprehensive downloadable report is created for each candidate including information on their motivation and drive, people skills, workplace abilities and values.

StaffMatcherâ„¢ delivers the latest in psychometric testing (also known as personality profiling or a personality test) to your recruitment and selection process. Online psychometric testing has developed rapidly to become a powerful assessment tool. By using StaffMatcherâ„¢, your ability to make the right hiring decision is dramatically increased when compared to interviewing alone.

Importantly, you are provided with a valid means of comparison between job applicants (candidates). This promotes fairness in your recruitment process, while greatly increasing your chances of selecting the right applicant for the job.

There is no cost to sign up to StaffMatcherâ„¢ , and you can issue tests to candidates FREE of charge. You only pay for the reports you wish to view. This minimises costs and keeps you in control.

We’ve taken this approach because we know that in the real world, not everything goes to plan. Some candidates who were initially keen on your job vacancy, suddenly withdraw or accept other job offers. StaffMatcherâ„¢ is the only service that allows you to issue the test to your candidates free of charge. You pay only for those candidate reports you want to view. Test multiple candidates then decide who you wish to progress with.
